sen.j: 人々が奉公や結婚その他の理由で他の土地に移る場合には、移動するものの年齢・性別・所属・宗旨などを記載して村役人の送一札とともに移転先にある新たな檀家寺に送付して移転の手続とした。
sen.e: When a person moved to a different place due to service, marriage or any other reasons, the person's age, sex, the temple he/she belonged to and religious Doctrine were entered in the terauke shomon and sent to the new danka temple along with the Okuri issatsu made by village officers as a procedure for relocation.

sen.j: 移動元から移動先に送る証文を宗旨送・寺送状と呼び、本人確認後の証明として移転先から移転元に送る証文を引取一札（ひきとりいっさつ）と呼んだ。
sen.e: The shomon sent from the original place of living to the new place was called 宗旨送 or 寺送状, while the shomon sent from the new place to the original place to prove the identification of the person was called Hikitori issatsu.
